product_name: SRAM Climber's Kit - Rival Rear Derailleur / 11-32 10-Speed Cassette / 1051 Chain
long_description: Upgrade your bike for conquering challenging climbs, this SRAM Climber's kit includes a Rival rear derailleur, 11-32 10-speed cassette and a chain to make easier work of ascents. Rival rear derailleur feature Exact Actuation design for precise, even gear changes-when you move a shifter, the derailleur moves the same amount. Medium length derailleur cage accepts the large 11-32 cassette and is made of light, stiff aluminum for consistent and responsive performance. 10-speed cassette has a massive spread from an 11-tooth cog to a gradient-nullifying 32-tooth cog to ensure you've got plenty of gearing options. Cogs included: 11, 12, 13, 15, 17, 19, 22, 25, 28, 32-tooth. The SRAM Climber's kit also includes a 1051 chain with PowerLock connecting link.
short_description: Upgrade your bike for conquering challenging climbs, this SRAM Climber's kit includes a Rival rear derailleur, 11-32 10-speed cassette and a chain to make easier work of ascents.
